resources.string: Access to the location service is required to use the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map.

This app requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings.
Please provide, requested permission for this app.
Looking for something to eat? Just browse the feed wherever you are.
Order and we\'ll deliver the menu right in front of your door.
Bookmark a menu you wanted to save and keep track of its status whether it\'s available or not.
We need your mobile number to book you a ride
Sorry, Connection to Google play services is failed. Try restart app or check play services
